Subject: Using Heritrix with an existing interface
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=192215828
X-Yahoo-Profile: jcgoodkin

Hi,

We are investigating replacing our in-houser harvester with an open 
source harvester and are seriously considering Heritrix. 

I was wondering if there is a way to define and send heritrix a job 
without going through the web UI. We have some existing interefaces 
that I am pretty sure we are going to want to keep, because they are 
very simple. 

The Heritrix interface is very nice, and I can seeing making use of 
it as well, but it does require a fairly sophisticated user. 

I would be interested to know if there is a way to run heritrix as a 
service rather than as an applicaiton.

Thanks!

Jay
